title: Chocolate coating equipment (glazing) US-CBY-1250
short_description: One of the equipments that occupies an important place in the production of confectionery products is glazing, that is, the equipment for covering products with chocolate and making it shine. The equipment in this US-CBY-1250 model is bigger, more powerful and more efficient than other models. The equipment can hold products from 80 kg to 150 kg at the same time, the diameter of the product container is 1250 mm, and the motor power is 3 kW. Other models of this equipment are shown in the description, and their parameters and prices differ from each other.
short_description_uz: Qandolatchilik mahsulotlari ishlab chiqarishda muhim o'rin egallaydigan uskunalardan biri glazurlash, ya'ni mahsulotlarga shokolad qoplash, uni yaltiratish uskunasidir. Ushbu US-CBY-1250 modeldagi uskuna boshqa modellarga nisbatan kattaroq, quvvatliroq va ish unumdorligi ham ko'proqdir. Uskuna o'ziga bir vaqtning o'zida 80 kg dan 150 kg gacha bo'lgan mahsulotni sig'dira oladi, mahsulot solinadigan idish diametri 1250 mm, motor quvvati esa 3 kW ni tashkil etadi. Tavsifda ushbu uskunaning boshqa modellari ham aks etgan va ularning parametrlari hamda narxlari bir-biridan farqlanadi.
short_description_ru: Одним из видов оборудования, занимающего важное место в производстве кондитерских изделий, является глазирование, то есть оборудование для покрытия изделий шоколадом и придания им блеска. Оборудование этой модели US-CBY-1250 больше, мощнее и эффективнее, чем у других моделей. Оборудование может одновременно удерживать продукцию от 80 кг до 150 кг, диаметр контейнера для продукта 1250 мм, мощность двигателя 3 кВт. Другие модели данного оборудования указаны в описании, их параметры и цены отличаются друг от друга.
short_description_en: One of the equipments that occupies an important place in the production of confectionery products is glazing, that is, the equipment for covering products with chocolate and making it shine. The equipment in this US-CBY-1250 model is bigger, more powerful and more efficient than other models. The equipment can hold products from 80 kg to 150 kg at the same time, the diameter of the product container is 1250 mm, and the motor power is 3 kW. Other models of this equipment are shown in the description, and their parameters and prices differ from each other.
long_description:
One of the equipments that occupies an important place in the production of confectionery products is glazing, that is, the equipment for covering products with chocolate and making it shine. The equipment in this US-CBY-1250 model is bigger, more powerful and more efficient than other models. The equipment can hold products from 80 kg to 150 kg at the same time, the diameter of the product container is 1250 mm, and the motor power is 3 kW. Other models of this equipment are shown in the description, and their parameters and prices differ from each other.

long_description_uz:
Qandolatchilik mahsulotlari ishlab chiqarishda muhim o'rin egallaydigan uskunalardan biri glazurlash, ya'ni mahsulotlarga shokolad qoplash, uni yaltiratish uskunasidir. Ushbu US-CBY-1250 modeldagi uskuna boshqa modellarga nisbatan kattaroq, quvvatliroq va ish unumdorligi ham ko'proqdir. Uskuna o'ziga bir vaqtning o'zida 80 kg dan 150 kg gacha bo'lgan mahsulotni sig'dira oladi, mahsulot solinadigan idish diametri 1250 mm, motor quvvati esa 3 kW ni tashkil etadi. Tavsifda ushbu uskunaning boshqa modellari ham aks etgan va ularning parametrlari hamda narxlari bir-biridan farqlanadi.

Оборудование этой модели US-CBY-1250 больше, мощнее и эффективнее, чем у других моделей.
